input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
sentences: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you'll be speaking a new language in no time!
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you can learn any language you desire!
Looking to learn a new language this semester? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you're sure to find the perfect fit for your learning style.

input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
sentences: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is an app that connects you to experienced language teachers from all over the world! Whether you're looking to learn Spanish, French, or Mandarin, LangLang has a teacher for you.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! Connect with language teachers from all over the world, and learn at your own pace.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you can learn whatever language you want, whenever you want.
